Hello there! ğŸ˜Š

The Backrooms Game was developed by me, David Campbell III, Founder/CEO/Lead Developer of Pie On A Plate Productions. Tirelessly, I worked nonstop to make this game quality and true to the nature of The Backrooms creepypasta, sometimes even going up to 3 days without sleeping in order to complete this project in a timely fashion.

I released the game for free, as I believed that anyone and everyone should have a chance to explore this endless maze of cosmic horror.

If you enjoyed this game, please consider purchasing this DLC as a way to say thanks, and support the future of The Backrooms Game and Pie On A Plate Productions!
With your support, we can continue to develop Deliciously Good Games â¤ï¸
